text: Moi tumikhan ke likhi dise, chutu bacha khan, kelemane tumikhan Baba Isor ke jane. Moi etu apuni khan ke likhise, baba khan, kelemane apuni khan jane etu ekjon ke kun shuru pora ase. Moi tumikhan ke likhise, jawan manu khan, kelemane tumikhan takot ase, aru Isor laga kotha tumikhan logote ase, aru tumikhan biya uporte jiti loise.
